# renameOptions

**Instance Property**

Options to allow renaming a matched accessory.

## Declaration

```swift
var renameOptions: ASAccessory.RenameOptions { get set }
```

## Discussion

To permit renaming, include [doc://com.apple.AccessorySetupKit/documentation/AccessorySetupKit/ASPickerDisplayItem/SetupOptions-swift.struct/rename] in the [doc://com.apple.AccessorySetupKit/documentation/AccessorySetupKit/ASPickerDisplayItem/setupOptions-swift.property]

## Customizing setup options

- **setupOptions**: Custom setup options for the accessory.
- **ASPickerDisplayItem.SetupOptions**: Setup options offered by the accessory picker.
- **ASAccessory.RenameOptions**: Options that affect the behavior of an accessory renaming operation.
